org.opends.server.backends.jeb

Class EntryContainer.VLVJEIndexCfgManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.opends.server.backends.jeb.EntryContainer.VLVJEIndexCfgManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ConfigurationAddListener<LocalDBVLVIndexCfg>, ConfigurationDeleteListener<LocalDBVLVIndexCfg>
    Enclosing class:
    EntryContainer

    public class EntryContainer.VLVJEIndexCfgManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements ConfigurationAddListener<LocalDBVLVIndexCfg>, ConfigurationDeleteListener<LocalDBVLVIndexCfg>
    This class is responsible for managing the configuration for VLV indexes used within this entry container.
